overview: In 2003, “SARS” quickly and fiercely spread to entire China. Everyone was afraid, staying home like their lives were stopped. Fu Zhen, a senior girl who is desperate for unrequited love, has a lively and strong, but lacks a survival instinct. A Hong Kong engineer, Mao Mingji is disappointed in love and has a dull personality. They travel to the "utopia of the heart" - Tibet. They began to heal and realize their journey of dreams.
title: Follow You
